PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-04191997-03-190PCO,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAppointment of JOSEPH WILLIAM POTTER, of Cumberland, Ontario, whose name is included in the list of names of eligible persons prepared by the Chairperson of the Public Service Staff Relations Board in accordance with subsection 14(1) of that Act, as a full-time member of the Public Service Staff Relations Board to hold office during good behaviour for a period of two years; and order that JOSEPH WILLIAM POTTER shall be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective April 14, 1997.
Attachments
